NSCameraUsageDescription.xml: <string>Enable Karenderia to access your camera to take photos of you and to save as profile picture.</string>

NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription.xml: <string>Enable Karenderia to access your photo library to get pictures from there.</string>

NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription.xml: <string>This allows us to use your location to find restaurant nearby.</string>

NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip.xml: <string>This allows us to use your location to provide you a nearby restaurant, and to facilitate more accurately, keeping you in the loop about Karenderia.</string>

NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription.xml: <string>This allows us to use your location to find restaurant nearby.</string>

NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription.xml: <string>Enable Karenderia to access your photo library to save pictures there.</string>

NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription.xml: <string>Improve location accuracy when finding nearby restaurant</string>
